mapper.select: select b.b_no, b.content, b.reg_dt, m.memb_no writer_no, m.name writer_name, c.cmt_no, c.content cmt_content, c.reg_dt cmt_reg_dt, m2.memb_no cmt_writer_no, m2.name cmt_writer_name from gms_board b left outer join gms_comment c on b.b_no = c.b_no left outer join gms_memb m on b.memb_no = m.memb_no left outer join gms_memb m2 on c.memb_no = m2.memb_no order by b_no desc
select b_no, g_no, memb_no, reg_dt, content, view_cnt, status from gms_board where b_no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into gms_board(g_no, memb_no,reg _dt, content, view_cnt, status) values(#{gno}, #{membno}, #{regdt}, #{content}, #{viewcnt}, #{status})
mapper.update: update gms_board set g_no = #{gno}, memb_no = #{membno}, reg_dt = #{regdt}, content = #{content}, view_cnt = #{viewcnt}, status = #{status} where b_no = #{no}
